thread.title: Will Ferrell Makes Surprise Appearance on 'Last Man on Earth'
thread.title_full: Will Ferrell Makes Surprise Appearance on 'Last Man on Earth'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Will Ferrell Makes Surprise Appearance on 'Last Man on Earth'
text:
Comments Ferrell had a guest spot in the latest episode of Will Forte-starring comedy series and will likely appear in future episode(s). 
" The Last Man on Earth " has just featured another big actor as a guest star. In the Sunday, October 4 episode of the FOX comedy, Will Ferrell made a surprise appearance, much to the delight of viewers and " Saturday Night Live " fans in particular. Ferrell's seen among the returning old Tucson crew, January Jones ' Melissa, Mary Steenburgen 's Gail and Boris Kodjoe 's other Phil Miller, as Will Forte 's Phil Miller tricked his wife Carol ( Kristen Schaal ) into coming with him to Malibu. Details of Ferrell's characters are not immediately available, but according to E! News , he could be trouble for Phil. Ferrell is expected to appear in future episode(s). He's the latest renown actor to join the cast of the post-apocalyptic-themed series after it was recently revealed that Phil's brother Mike is played by none other than Forte's fellow "SNL" alum, Jason Sudeikis . "The Last Man on Earth" airs Sundays at 9:30 P.M. on FOX.
